tool_description: Executes calibration measurements at specified points, collecting data from the instrument under test against reference standards with proper measurement protocols.

instrument_id.description: Unique identifier for the instrument being calibrated

measurement_points.description: Calibration points to measure in millimeters

repetitions.description: Number of measurement repetitions per point

settling_time.description: Settling time between measurements in seconds

error_messages: Measurement point mismatch: Number of measurement_points must equal number of reference_values.
Invalid repetitions: Must be between 3 and 20 for statistical validity.
Measurement force out of range: Force must be between 0.1 and 50 Newtons.
Invalid approach direction: Use one of [ascending, descending, bidirectional].
Measurement failed: Unable to obtain stable readings at one or more points.
Reference standard error: Cannot access or read reference values properly.
usage: Provide measurement points with corresponding reference values. Execute measurements with specified repetitions and protocols. Ensure stable conditions throughout measurement sequence.

measured_values.description: Average measured values for each point in millimeters

individual_readings.description: All individual readings for each measurement point

measurement_errors.description: Error values (measured minus reference) in micrometers
